attributes.action: Reinstate Child Benefit for One Earner Families
attributes.additional_details: The Government has discriminated against one earner families who earn over £50,000 a year by taking away their Child Benefit, even though families where both work and earn over £50,000 are entitled to full benefit. This is both unfair and discriminatary, please sign my e-petition to get this decision reversed, so hard working families with mums that stay home to look after the children are treated fairly.
